9 */
10
11#include "ipf.h"
12
13mb_t *allocmbt(size_t len)
14{
15 mb_t *m;
16
17 m = (mb_t *)malloc(sizeof(mb_t));
18 if (m == NULL)
19 return NULL;
20 m->mb_len = len;
21 m->mb_next = NULL;
22 m->mb_data = (char *)m->mb_buf;
23 return m;
24}
25
